definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state

sentences.english: He was a quiet and thoughtful man.
sentences.chinese: 他是一個性格內向，思維縝密的人。

sentences.english: As far as defense is concerned- we need to buy more sophisticdinedd weapons.
sentences.chinese: 就防備的看法來說，我們須要購置更多縝密的武器。

sentences.english: Charles thought carefully about assembling a sizeable army and ensuring his supply lines.
sentences.chinese: 查理縝密計劃瞭如何召集龐大的軍隊並保證供給線。

sentences.english: Is it possible to lower the risk of failure if they use careful planning?
sentences.chinese: 如果計劃縝密，他們是否能夠降低風險？

sentences.english: First of all, it's very much constructed.
sentences.chinese: 首先，細節上構思的很縝密。

definition: lit. to spin silk from cocoons/fig. to make a painstaking investigation (idiom)
to master the subject via a comprehensive study of surrounding areas
the rise and fall of the terrain (idiom)/(fig.) the whole sequence of events/causes and effects
many and complicated/mired in minor details
handling a butcher's cleaver with ease (idiom); to do sth skillfully and easily
